original_title: 金粉蝶～羽ばたいてご開帳～
overview: Manhattan Aoshima and World Hashimoto are invited to the villa of fortune teller Gold Kotegawa along Gold's maid, Maki. One morning, Gold is found dead. There are three suspects. Money, honor, body, and jealousy.... The story is told through recollections, as each person's thoughts and relationships are intertwined. Who killed Gold?
title: Gold Dust Butterfly - Flap Your Wings and Open the Door
